description: A customizable alert component used to inform the user about important events

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the outer div element.

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Time taken to dismiss the alert in milliseconds

properties.name: dismissible
properties.description: Whether the alert has a dismiss button

events.name: dismissClick
events.description: An event that fires when the alert is dismissed
